| HistoryText             = A group of mercenaries rabbits commanded by [[Blackjack O'Hare (Earth-616)|Blackjack O'Hare]]. In a beginning, the Black Bunny Brigade was contracted by  [[Judson Jakes (Earth-616)|Judson Jakes]] to make the dirty work, like kidnapping [[Lylla (Earth-616)|Lylla]] and stealing the Gideon's Bible. [[Rocket Raccoon (Earth-616)|Rocket Raccoon]] was an enemy for the Black Bunny Brigade, but later and by Blackjack orders, they helped Raccoon in various opportunities.{{citation}}
